scene:
Cargo Ship - Ocean Crossing
Exploring the Ship A Suspicious Character Sephiroth
CloudWe'll cross the ocean, to the new continent....even if we are wearing Shinra's uniforms... In the cargo hold, there are a few others in Shinra uniform. The sailors are busy with various tasks and the soldiers are apparently standing guard... SailorI'm workin' hard already, and you still want me to do more?The new President's probably the same.He's just gonna order us around anyway. YuffieUrrrgh... This is why... I hate ships.Hey, Cloud. You have any 'Tranquilizers'? Cloud- Here, use this- Nope
Here, use this YuffieThanks... Gross... this is bitter.
Nope Yuffie...unless it's an emergency get away from me.
YuffieWhere are the others? CloudI dunno. Aren't they hiding somewhere around here? YuffieHow should I know...? Ugh...... urk...... Cloud jumps back, and moves on to find the others. AerithUmm...... It's me Aerith.Hey, Cloud. Did you see the Airship at Junon? Cloud...I heard it was big, but I didn't expect it to be THAT big. AerithThat was REALLY something.Hey, do you think I could get on it? Cloud- I'll take you someday- I dunno...
I'll take you someday ...keep hoping. AerithWow! I'm really looking forward to it!Let's ride the Airship together, OK? Promise, promise me!
I dunno... ...It's a Shinra weapon. We probably should've destroyed it. Aerith...Hmm. But just once, I'd like to ride it.Just once, I'd like to ride that Airship.
Sailor 2It won't do any good trying to stop me!All right! I'm going to show the new President what I'm made of! SoldierHey, get to work!Both the new President Rufus and Heidegger are aboard this ship!If we do good, we could get promoted! Cloud goes up to the deck. He finds Tifa up on the lookout tower. TifaYes sir! Everything quiet, sir!...But, you know what? I really hate this uniform.Uniforms, soldiers, war, I hate 'em all.They take away all the things and people you love...I wish they'd all disappear. Right, Cloud? Cloud- Yeah......- I don't know
Yeah...... TifaYou're right!Uh, yes sir, I'll continue my watch sir! Hee hee...
I don't know Tifa...Cloud. Wearing those clothes seems to have changed you a little.Does it remind you of being in SOLDIER? I hope not...
Sailor 3President Rufus and his men are in the Bridge of the Ship. If they see you slacking, they'll bust you one! Sailor 4Hey! What's wrong, kid? You got no pep!A seaman's gotta have umph! Cloud- I'm tired...- Something's missing- Leave me alone
I'm tired... Sailor 4I got just the perfect thing! 'Invisible Alpha'-- A super drink for seamen!!Just one'll rejuvenate you! Only 250 gil! Cloud- I'll take it- No thanks
I'll take it Sailor 4Thanks! This is a necessity for a sailor.This is a must item for a sailor! Ha ha ha! HP/MP Restored!
No thanks Sailor 4Hey! Seamen shouldn't be so stingy!
Something's missing Sailor 4Ey ey! Whattaya mean, 'missin'!? An item shop menu opens.
Leave me alone Nothing happens.
Soldier 2Oh man, we're almost to Costa del Sol.When I get there, I'm going to take a long overdue vacation. Maybe I'll go down to the beach and get a tan... Red XIII............It's me.Red XIII.I'm a little woozy, but I shouldn't get caught.Humans only look at appearances anyway.Anyway you look at it, I'd say I make a fine human being. He turns around, showing his tail sticking out the back of his uniform. It's pretty hard standing on two feet... Back in the cargo hold... AerithHey, Cloud. Did you see Barret?I hope he's not doing anything stupid... Cloud goes back up to find Barret just outside the bridge, watching Rufus and Heidegger through the window. BarretLook, Cloud. It's Rufus and Heidegger.They're this close but we can't do a thing to 'em...Ummmm...... Gmmmmm......How can he...... Goin' off laughin' like that?Because of him, Biggs...... Wedge...... Jessie......!Ggggggggh... Ggggh......! Ggggggghhh!!God!! I can't take it anymore!I'm gonna settle things here and now...... Emergency alert! Reports of a suspicious character found! Those not on detail, search the ship. Report when found!I repeat. Suspicious character found on board! Those not on detail, search the ship. Report when found! BarretDamn, did they find us!?Hey, that don't seem like us. Do they mean... Tifa and the others!?Get off your spikey butt and let's go, Cloud! Barret and Cloud join the others gathered on the deck of the ship. TifaEveryone all right!? BarretYou all right!? AerithHuh? TifaEveryone's here... right? BarretHey, wait.You don't think that suspicious character is... SomeoneSephiroth!? TifaReally!? BarretHow the hell am I supposed to know!? Cloud...Let's find out. Red XIIIIt's the most logical thing to do. Then, who's going to go? Yuffie (backing away)N, not me...I don't even like Sephiroth anyway. And beside...... ugh...... urk...... Cloud...... Sephiroth............All right, let's go! BarretI'm goin' too! AerithIs it really Sephiroth......? TifaTake me with you! Red XIIIThese clothes are too tight on me. Can I switch with you? YuffieI told you... I don't want... to, ugh...... urk...... Sailor 4Say, who are you? You're not a part of the crew.Oh well, seamen never bother with details!How you feelin'! Cloud- I'm tired...- Something's missing- Leave me alone Cloud the others go down into the cargo hold, where two sailors and a soldier lie motionless on the floor. Soldier...the Engine Room... ...a suspicious...... character...No...... there's no way...... that...... not a human...... That thing's not human...... Cloud enters the engine room and walks up to the one soldier still standing. CloudIs it...... Sephiroth? The man turns around and collapses. CloudNo... not Sephiroth! Sephiroth......After a long sleep......the time.........time has...... come...
BarretLook, Cloud!! AerithLook, Cloud!! TifaCloud, look!! Red XIIIOver there, Cloud. YuffieOv...... over there!!
Sephiroth rises up through the floor of the engine room. CloudSephiroth! You're alive! Sephiroth......Who are you? CloudYou don't remember me!? I'm Cloud! SephirothCloud... CloudSephiroth! What are you thinking!? What are you doing!? Sephiroth...the time...... is now... CloudWhat!? What are you saying? Be more...... Sephiroth flies off through the ceiling, and Cloud's party enters a battle with Jenovaâˆ™BIRTH, fighting and defeating it. A small tentacle-like piece remains after the battle.
BarretIsn't he...... that guy? AerithI've seen this before... TifaI've seen this somewhere... before. Red XIIIThat's what disappeared from the Shinra building... YuffieEeeew! What IS it! GROSS!
Cloud...Jenova. The arm of Jenova.
BarretJenova...You mean he's been walkin' around with that thing? AerithJenova... With this thing? TifaJenova... He's been carrying this thing around? Red XIIISephiroth took Jenova... What does it mean? YuffieGag... I'm feeling sick as it is without you having to show me THIS...
CloudSo it WAS Sephiroth.
BarretHe said the time is now. AerithThe time is now... I think that was what was said. TifaHe said something about it being time for something. Red XIIIThe time is now...? What does that mean? YuffieHe was mumbling something about time!
Cloud......Time... is now?
BarretI don't know WHAT the hell's goin' on!Cloud, why don't you explain to me what's happened so far? AerithHmm... I don't get it.Hey, Cloud. Can you explain it to us? TifaI'm getting so confused...Cloud, explain what's happened so far. Red XIIIHmm... The story's not that simple.Cloud, why don't you summarize what's happened so far? YuffieSo what's the story?Hey Cloud. Give us a quick run down.
Cloud- I'll try- Too much trouble [With this choice, he doesn't say anything more.] Cloud...I'll try, but don't interrupt me while I'm explaining.Sephiroth went off searching for the Promised Land, so he could become the ruler of the planet... That was 5 years ago.Then Sephiroth came back and killed President Shinra.And then just now all of us saw Sephiroth.He was carrying Jenova with him....This much I do know. He told me he wants to go to the Promised Land with his mother, Jenova....I guess that's about it. Dock workers--We will be docking in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes. Prepare for docking.
BarretWhoa! We'd best hurry and hide somewhere. AerithMaybe we shouldn't stay in here anymore... TifaWe should hide somewhere again. Red XIIII don't think it's wise to stay here any longer. YuffiePhew... We're finally here... Now we gotta hide......
The others start for the exit. Cloud turns back to look at where Sephiroth was. CloudSephiroth... is alive...The Promised Land... Does it really exist...? The cargo ship continues on to dock at Costa del Sol.
